original_text: On the fourth day they assembled in the Valley of Beracah, for there they blessed the Lord. Therefore the name of that place has been called the Valley of Beracah to this day.
korean_text: 넷째 날에 무리가 브라가 골짜기에 모여서 거기서 여호와를 송축한지라 그러므로 오늘날까지 그 곳을 브라가 골짜기라 일컫더라

sentences.original_text: they assembled in the Valley of Beracah
for there they blessed the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 그곳에서 주를 찬송했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: Therefore the name of that place
has been called the Valley of Beracah
